examples.program:
To A for life, then to B.
A dies.

To A for life, then to B for life, then to C for life.
B dies.
A dies.
C dies.

To Slughorn for life, but if Slughorn eats chocolate to Charlie Bucket.
Slughorn dies.

O conveys to A.
O conveys to B for life, then to C.
A conveys Blackacre to D.

examples.result: Life estate in Lear, contingent remainders in life estate in Goneril, contingent remainder in fee simple in Regan, contingent remainder in Cordelia.
examples.program: To Lear for life, then if Goneril survives Regan to Goneril for life, otherwise to Regan, then to Cordelia and her heirs.

To A and eir heirs so long as A is unmarried.
A marries B.

To Tenant for 10 years.
5 years pass.
5 years pass.
